GdiControl.desc: A control that maintains an area on a gui where GDI+ drawings can be done and provides a callback that lets a user draw in the area each time the control is drawn.

graphic.desc: Callback that is called each time the underlying control is drawn, but before the `GridGUI.GdiControl.hbm` has been drawn on the underlying control. Bind the instance of `GridGUI.GdiControl` to the callback and draw what you want the `GridGUI.GdiControl` to show using the `GridGUI.GdiControl.G`.

hbm.desc: A handle to bitmap with the same size as the underlying control. Updated each timer the control is drawn with a new size.

hdc.desc: The device context allowing drawing on the `GridGUI.GdiControl.hbm` by means of `GridGUI.GdiControl.G`.

G.desc: A pointer to the graphics object that is associated with the drawing buffer (`GridGUI.GdiControl.hbm`). Updated each timer the control is drawn with a new size.

pos.desc: The last position that this control was drawn at.

__CleanUp.desc: Deletes or releases the GDI objects that the members point to.

__CreateCompatibleDC.desc: This function creates a memory device context (DC) compatible with the specified device.

args.name: hdc
args.desc: Handle to an existing device context. If this handle is 0 (by default), the function creates a memory device context compatible with the application's current screen

returns.desc: returns the handle to a device context or 0 on failure.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

__CreateDIBSection.desc: The CreateDIBSection function creates a DIB (Device Independent Bitmap) that applications can write to directly.

args.name: w
args.desc: width of the bitmap to create.

args.name: h
args.desc: height of the bitmap to create.

args.name: bpp
args.desc: bits per pixel (32 = ARGB).

args.name: ppvBits
args.desc: A pointer to a variable that receives a pointer to the location of the DIB bit values.

returns.desc: A handle to a bitmap with width `w` and height `h`.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

__CreateRect.desc: Creates a Rect object, containing a the coordinates and dimensions of a rectangle.

args.name: Rect
args.desc: Name to call the Rect object.

args.name: x
args.desc: x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.

args.name: y
args.desc: y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle.

args.name: w
args.desc: Width of the rectangle.

args.name: h
args.desc: Height of the rectangle.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

__DeleteDC.desc: The DeleteDC function deletes the specified device context (DC).

args.name: hDC
args.desc: A handle to the device context. An application must not delete a DC whose handle was obtained by calling the GetDC function. Instead, it must call the ReleaseDC function to free the DC

returns.desc: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

__DeleteGraphics.desc: Deletes the graphics object pointed to by a pointer.

args.name: pGraphics
args.desc: The pointer to the graphics object that should be deleted.

__DeleteObject.desc: This function deletes a logical pen, brush, font, bitmap, region, or palette, freeing all system resources associated with the object. After the object is deleted, the specified handle is no longer valid

args.name: hObject
args.desc: Handle to a logical pen, brush, font, bitmap, region, or palette to delete.

returns.desc: Nonzero indicates success. Zero indicates that the specified handle is not valid or that the handle is currently selected into a device context.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

__GraphicsFromHDC.desc: This function gets the graphics from the handle to a device context.

args.name: hdc
args.desc: A handle to the device context.

returns.desc: Returns a pointer to the graphics of a bitmap.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

args.name: guiHwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the gui that the GuiControl should be added to.

args.name: options
args.desc: The options that the GuiControl will be created with. Does not accept vVars.

args.name: graphic
args.desc: Callback that will be called each time the underlying control is drawn, but before the `GridGUI.GdiControl.hbm` has been drawn on the underlying control. Bind the instance of `GridGUI.GdiControl` to the callback and draw what you want the `GridGUI.GdiControl` to show using the `GridGUI.GdiControl.G`.

__Prepare.desc: Checks if the controls position or size has changed and if it has then recreated the gdi members.

args.name: area
args.desc: The new position to check.

__SelectObject.desc: The SelectObject function selects an object into the specified device context (DC). The new object replaces the previous object of the same type. See link for additional details.

args.name: hdc
args.desc: Handle to a DC

args.name: hgdiobj
args.desc: A handle to the object to be selected into the DC.

returns.desc: If the selected object is not a region and the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to the object being replaced.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

__UpdateLayeredWindow.desc: Updates a layered window with the handle to the DC of a gdi bitmap.

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: Handle of the layered window to update.

args.name: hdc
args.desc: Handle to the DC of the GDI bitmap to update the window with.

args.name: x
args.desc: X position to place the window. If omitted then the layered window will use its current x coordinate.

args.name: y
args.desc: Y position to place the window. If omitted then the layered window will use its current y coordinate.

args.name: w
args.desc: Width of the window. If omitted then the layered window will use its current width.

args.name: h
args.desc: Height of the window. If omitted then the layered window will use its current height.

args.name: Alpha
args.desc: The value in the range (0-255) to set the window transparency.

returns.desc: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero.

meta: description and code taken from Gdip_All.ahk

Draw.desc: Draws the underlying control at the new position and size. As well as calling `GridGUI.GdiControl.UpdateGraphic`.

args.name: pos
args.desc: The position and size to draw the control with.

GDIDraw.desc: Draws the `GridGUI.GdiControl.hbm` (bitmap) on the underlying control, and updates the position and size of the control to the one in `GridGUI.GdiControl.pos`.

UpdateGraphic.desc: Calls the user callback `GridGUI.GdiControl.graphic` if defined, before calling `GridGUI.GdiControl.GDIDraw`.
